biotools.summary: Cnngeno is a high-precision deep learning based strategy for the calling of structural variation genotype. The current hand-crafted features and parametric statistical models used for genotype calling are still greatly influenced by the size of structural variations and the coverage of the next sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: Cnngeno
